content: 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 10 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 10 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 10 sts repeat from* across row chain 3 turn row 20 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 9 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 10 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 10 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 10 sts repeat from* across row do not fasten_off © cutie stuffs llc and monkey booboo crochet this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only please do not reproduce or publish this pattern thank you finishing continue at the lower corner of right front chain 1 2 single_crochet in the corner st work single_crochet evenly across right front neck chain 4 to make a button hole slip_stitch of the last st 2 single_crochet in the corner st *1 single_crochet in the next st chain 3 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat from * across neck 3 single_crochet in the corner st work single_crochet evenly across left front 3 single_crochet in the corner st 1 single_crochet in each st along the bottom of the cardigan ending at the lower corner of right front fasten_off sew a button on the upper corner of left front © cutie stuffs llc and monkey booboo crochet this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only please do not reproduce or publish this pattern thank you
